text: @BetteMidler Trump cant be positive for #covid19.  He is the draw at Mar-a-lago. Whose gonna go if  main attraction is disease-ridden & could kill you?  Even if positive, he will continue meeting w/ folks & then hide the illness itself.  For a resort, covid is akin to bedbugs.
